author: JoshPBR2
body:
#### PR description:

This is a clone of the PR linked [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45544) with the correct cmssw repo upstream. 

#### PR validation:

Workarounds are still needed to test, as ZDC geometry is still an issue ([here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45530))

This PR will not require any back ports and is intended for heavy-ion data taking.

@hjbossi
title: Added more ZDC functionality to DQM
